1178700.name: CreateTech
1178700.description:
Welcome to CreateTech!


In this indie puzzle game, you take on the role of a creator god tasked with populating brave new worlds full of cute fantastical creatures rendered in high-tech 8-bit glory.

The only problem is that you have no idea how to do your job. And if you don't finish filling this next series of planets on time, the Big Boss is finally going to fire you.

Can you figure out the right ingredients to create stable ecosystems and save yourself from the pink slip before it's too late?

Play CreateTech and experience:
  • The thrill of crafting creatures from raw elements themselves
  • The joy of watching new life come forth in unexpected surprises
  • The tragedy of your brand new fledgling species consumed by deadly predators
  • The tension of high-stakes boss battles (seriously, did we mention your job was on the line, here?)
  • The pathos of being lectured by an Assistant HR Manager
  • The satisfaction of overcoming the odds to survive another day in the cubicle of the Gods
